summary: This mod is changing Unrelenting Force Shout to Sparta's Force Shout.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#1155Cc][size=5][b]1. DESCRIPTION[/b][/size][/color]


This mod is changing Unrelenting Force Shout to Sparta's Force Shout.


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]2. FEATURES[/size][/b][/color]


This mod changes name and sounds of Unrelenting Force Shout to "This is Sparta!" voice from "300" movie.


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]3. CHANGELOG[/size][/b][/color]


v1.2.1
          • Changed: voice a little bit

v1.1
          • Added: female compatibility

v1.0
          • Release


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]4. INSTALLATION[/size][/b][/color]


AUTOMATIC (with NMM):
just click DOWNLOAD WITH MANAGER and after downloading just install it

MANUAL:
extract content of rar file to <SKYRIMINSTALLFOLDER>/Data


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]5. NOTES[/size][/b][/color]


• report bugs
• comment


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]6. MY OTHER MODS[/size][/b][/color]


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9219]Dropping Items with R-key -FIX- v1.1[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27317/]Owning Houses Without Finishing Quests v1.2[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48057/]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches - Polska Wersja v1.2[/url]
author: G-Phoenix
